sense.def:
A disguise
je sprememba zunanjosti; z njo želimo preprečiti, da bi nas ljudje prepoznali.

seg.quote: ...the disguise he wore when he escaped.

sense.def:
Če je človek
in disguise
, je spremenil svojo zunanjost, da ga ljudje ne bi prepoznali.

seg.quote: The Emperor came aboard the ship in disguise.

sense.def:
To disguise oneself
pomeni obleči in vesti se kot nekdo drug, da bi koga preslepili.

seg.quote: I disguised myself as a French priest.

sense.def:
To disguise something
pomeni nekaj spremeniti, da ljudje tistega ne prepoznajo ali za tisto ne zvedo.

seg.quote: He tried to disguise his voice.
It proved difficult to disguise her anxiety.
